page.title: 16GARVESTONE VILLAGE HALL
page.content: { We interviewed MRS.E.STEPHENS who is {the treasurer of the W.I.and wife of {the rector - Reverend Peter Stephens. {She is also a Governor of the school. Q:Do you belong to the Parish Council or any other Committee? A:I am on the W.I. Committee. Q:How long have you been going to the meetings? A:3 years. Q:What position do you hold? A:Treasurer. Q:Do you like going to the meetings? A:Yes because you meet new people. Q:What sort of things do the W.I. do? A:We have a meeting every month.We have speakers and outings. {Note:the Pre-School Playgroup also {uses the village hall regularly.They {have a weekly session every Thursday {afternoon.Mrs. Stephens also helps {to run that.
